column1: * [[Beren]] and [[Lúthien]] return to [[Middle-earth]], both mortal. They inhabit [[Tol Galen]] and the area becomes known as [[Dor Firn-i-Guinar]], "the Land of the Dead that Live".<ref>{{S
* The [[Union of Maedhros]] clears [[Beleriand]] of [[orcs]], but in doing so reveals the Eldar's full strength to [[Morgoth]].<ref>{{GA
* The [[Evil Breath]] is unleashed from [[Angband]] and [[Túrin]] falls ill.<ref>{{UT
